name: Team8-Ecooks
description:
Gameplay

Enjoy the exhilaration of controlling mirroring moving characters to solve problems, and the excitement of seeing what dishes you can make with the items you've collected !

Meet Nicolas and Ken in a cartoon-style puzzle platformer ! 

Help them solve environmental problems such as turning off the air-conditioning and throwing away rubbish and be rewarded by cooking delicious dishes from Belgian and Japanese culture !

The overall gameplay is based around ,the characters moving in comic book panels and mirrored movements to remind of the differences between our cultures reading directions.

Have fun !

Controls

WASD or arrows to move 

E to interact

Credits
